DOC.brief_summary: This study will investigate antihypertensive activity and safety profile of Tarka in Russian hypertension patients by ambulatory blood pressure measurement (ABPM)
DOC.brief_title: Russian Study of the Efficacy and Safety of Tarka in Patients With Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Hypertension SBP > 180 mm Hg, DBP > 114 mm Hg Subject has a hypersensitivity to trandolapril or verapamil
